"Roundabout Theatre Companyâ€™s revival has a lot going for it. The cast of nine populating a second-rate traveling theatrical company is uniformly strong. Andrea Martin is a delight as the well-named Dotty Otley...Director Jeremy Herrin keeps everything running like clockwork...If the play has a flaw, it is its length.
